Edward Henning

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Max
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Dill
  4. Location of Family: Davenport, NE
  5. Sending Organization: n/a
  6. Arrival Place: Unknown
  7. Age on Arrival: 7
  8. Date of Birth: 1875, NJ
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: In 1900 census, 58 yo Clara Henning and her son Edward lived with the Matsons; listed as "servant."
  11. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; 1900 United States Federal Census; OTR, 309; Eloise Thomsen Corres.
